hours_text:
# Hours of Operation

### 

**THE MUSEUM IS OPEN TO THE PUBLIC:**

  * Tuesday thru Friday: 10:00am to 5:00pm

  * Saturday: 10:00am to 3:00pm

  * Sunday:(Open in Winter) 11am-2pm

  * Monday: CLOSED

**OPEN LATE for Holiday Hours:**

  * December 18,_(Thursday)_ Until 8pm

  * December 20,  _(Saturday)_ Until 5pm

****

**CLOSED For Holiday Hours:**

  * December 28,_(Sunday)_

  * December 24 & 25, (_Wednesday – Thursday)_ ⁠

  * December 31 & January 1, (_Wednesday – Thursday)⁠_

  * Admission to the museum is free, donations are appreciated
  * Interested in becoming a member at the museum? Contact Michael Stokes for membership at mstokes@museumcenter.org
  * For pricing on field trips, truck presentations, and guided tours please reach out to Adam Romano at ARomano@museumcenter.org
  * To book an event with us please contact Jill Norton at Jnorton@museumcenter.org

admission_text:
# Become a Member

### As a member of the Museum & Cultural Center at 5ive Points you become part of a group that encourages the preservation of our history and the celebration of our heritage as we tell the story of the Ocoee Region.

Your membership helps us provide cultural and educational opportunities for the larger community from museum-hosted events to educational trunks our community’s teachers can request to help in educating our children.

Our members receive exclusive benefits including reciprocal memberships to other institutions, discounts for and free tickets to Museum Center events as well as discounts to our Gift Gallery that helps support over 32 local artists. We offer membership levels for every budget.

For membership inquiries please contact Michael Stokes at [mstokes@museumcenter.org](mailto:mstokes@museumcenter.org) or 423-339-5745 ext. 107

[Join Today!](https://museumcenter.membership.veevartapp.com)

### Individual

$3535

  * 1 free ticket to each qualifying event*
  * Discounted ticket to designated museum sponsored events & concerts
  * 10% discount at Museum Gift Gallery
  * Discounts at local shops & restaurants
  * SERM Reciprocal Membership**
  * May add Smithsonian Affiliate *** membership for $30

### Couple

$60

  * 2 free tickets to each qualifying event*
  * Discounted tickets to designated museum sponsored events & concerts
  * 10% discount at Museum Gift Gallery
  * Discounts at local shops & restaurants
  * SERM Membership**
  * May a...

## [Casino Royale Gala ](https://museumcenter.org/events/2752/)

> January 17, 2026: Casino Royale Gala! Join us in your James Bond black tie attire for a lively casino experience featuring blackjack, craps, poker, slots, and roulette.

[](https://museumcenter.org/rentals/rooms/)

### [Rental Opportunities Available ](https://museumcenter.org/rentals/rooms/)

The museum can house your event – from 5 to 700, all types of events are hosted at the museum every week. We have ample parking, beautiful grounds, temperature controlled space, located in the heart of downtown Cleveland, TN.

_For information on how to book any of these spaces, contact Jill Norton.____JNorton@MuseumCenter.org, (423) 339 – 5745 Ext. 103_

[](https://www.tn.gov/revenue/title-and-registration/license-plates/available-license-plates/arts-commission/arts-fish.html)
